name: Aldebaran
overview: On 6th of April 2180, a disaster happens when bacteria ALD-7 that was taken from Aldebaran System is accidentally set free in a bio lab. The lives of the nine scientists are in danger. The task of the player is - by using a remote-controlled robot - to bring the scientists into the upper right room and to avoid the spread of the free bacteria by sealing the lab rooms at seven places before the indicator at the upper rim of the screen reaches 100%. The less time one needs, the more points are given.
